alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Frederick; Northern Baltimore; Northwest Harford (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 03 at 3:39AM EST until February 04 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM TO 4 PM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Freezing rain. Ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Frederick MD, Carroll, Northern Baltimore and Northwest Harford Counties. * WHEN...From 5 AM to 4 PM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions will likely impact the Friday commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. When venturing outside, watch your first few steps taken on steps, sidewalks, and driveways, which could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.

area.areaDesc: Carroll; Frederick; Northern Baltimore; Northwest Harford
